structure.unit: Registration Of Certain Professions And Occupations

law.text: Registered chiropractors may render services under the terms and provisions of the workersâ€™ compensation and rehabilitation laws. No registered chiropractor or person practicing chiropractic shall include, or permit or cause to be included, in any advertising in any newspaper, or by radio, television, display sign, personal solicitation or other manner of advertising, any written or spoken words or statements of character tending to deceive or mislead the public.
